text: Tsui Ting Or (born 13 June 1993), known professionally as Poon Choi Ying Chi, is a Hong Kong singer and comedian. She is the director and one of the hosts of the news satire programmes of TV Most] and is the vocalist of the band Autumn Cicada.輔仁網：盤菜瑩子背後，我都係一個人（盤菜瑩子） Beside her role in the satire programmes, she has been an opinion leader among the younger generation of Hong Kong people and has impact on the recent emergence of a Hong Kong identity. She is also known for her involvement in pro-democratic activism. ==References== == External links == * https://www.facebook.com/poonchoiyingchi/ Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Hong Kong actresses Category:21st-century Hong Kong singers Category:Cantopop singers Category:Hong Kong female singers Category:Hong Kong idols Category:Hong Kong television actresses Category:21st-century women singers
title: Poon Choi Ying Chi
